08.headline: Interop Protocols
08.summary: Modularizing the stack: The most interesting development with these designs is the separation between the transport and verification layers.

08.headline: Chainge
08.summary: DAO proposal passed with 95% approval rate. Securing a $13M USD capital injection. Adding into circulation 50 million XCHNG from the investment allocation. Guaranteeing $1 million USD in Q2 profit.

08.headline: Wormhole
08.summary: Building MultiGov by teaming up with tallyxyz and scopelift. MultiGov is a multichain governance system that will soon be available to DAOs on Solana, Ethereum, and EVMs L2s.

09.headline: Picasso
09.summary: Partners with redactedCartel to bring Pirex ETH into Cosmos.

09.headline: Polyhedra
09.summary: Partners with bounce_bit enabling interop between bounceBit and other networks including Bitcoin and Ethereum.

09.headline: Flare
09.summary: RainProtocol - intents like DEX coming to Flare. Open-source desktop app lets you write, deploy, and manage perp token trading strategies written in Rainlang on any EVM network.

10.headline: Jolt
10.summary: New approach to zkVM design. 6X better than RISC Zero and 2X than SP1.

15.headline: Across and Uniswap
15.summary: Propose cross-chain intent standard. With the standard for cross-chain intents, users on Across, UniswapX, or other intents-based systems can sign a cross-chain order that follows one standard.

15.headline: Picasso
15.summary: Picasso Network Extends IBC Protocol to Bridge Solana and Cosmos.

15.headline: Axelar
15.summary: Gamified Web3 marketplace powered by ESE interchaintokens.

17.headline: Astria
17.summary: Building Sequencing layer for permissionless rollups.

17.headline: Scroll
17.summary: Upgrade to Bernoulli has added optimizations like EIP-4844 support, SHA-256 precompile.

17.headline: Polyhedra
17.summary: Partners with Google Cloud to bring ZK proofs to developers.

23.headline: Mina
23.summary: Berkeley upgrade in June 4. Off-chain computation, cost-effective proof verification, and private inputs directly into the hands of developers.

23.headline: Map
23.summary: Partners with Orient Asset Management Limited. Integration and innovation of traditional financial institutions.

23.headline: Biconomy
23.summary: Integrated by Eesee_io - a gamified liquidity solution and marketplace for digital assets, tokens and RWAs on blast.

23.headline: Particle
23.summary: BOB is integrating Particle Network's Account abstraction protocol, BTC connect for a smooth BOB mainnet UX.

23.headline: Safe
23.summary: Introduces Safe{Pass}. New activity program that transforms your safe interactions into points.

23.headline: Chainlink
23.summary: Arkham has upgraded its blockchain intelligence exchange using Chainlink Functions to bring intel verification onchain in a trust-minimized manner.

24.headline: Geometry
24.summary: Collaboration with Mina Foundation and CelestiaOrg.

24.headline: AltLayer
24.summary: Shumo partners with AltLayer to bring proof aggregation based settlement to the next 10k zkRollups onchain.

25.headline: AltLayer
25.summary: Integration with Nebra - A proof aggregation tech which can reduce overall verification fees up to 1/10th!

25.headline: Caldera
25.summary: Partners with TreasureDAO as their official RaaS provider.

25.headline: NIM
25.summary: Unveils first building block of the Nim AI Framework which provides economic ownership and verified access to AI models.

25.headline: Owlto
25.summary: Collaborates with QuickSwapDEX, the leading DEX and AMM on all Polygon chains.

25.headline: ZetaChain
25.summary: Commits 5% of total ZETA supply to developer and dApps ecosystem growth program including 1% for Bitcoin projects.

25.headline: Wormhole
25.summary: W token is now natively multichain using Wormhole Native Token Transfers (NTT) framework. Native W is now available in SPL format on Solana and ERC20 format on Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism and base.

25.headline: Google Cloud
25.summary: Announces Web3 Portal. Experiment on testnet. Discover blockchain datasets & developer tools from Google Cloud and our partners. Learn how the Web3 Startup Program can help you build faster.
